Sponsors

The xpose package development was kindly sponsored by:

  • Pharmetheus (2017)
  • Pfizer (2017)

History

The new xpose was inspired from data visualization and model diagnostics concepts established by the xpose4 package. Xpose4 was developed by the Department of Pharmaceutical Biosciences at Uppsala University:

  • Copyright (C) 2009-present Andrew C. Hooker, Mats O. Karlsson and E. Niclas Jonsson.
  • Copyright (C) 2005-2008 Andrew C. Hooker, Justin J. Wilkins, Mats O. Karlsson and E. Niclas Jonsson.
  • Copyright (C) 1998-2004 E. Niclas Jonsson and Mats O. Karlsson.
